title: The cruel assault of Gods fort
author: Awdelay, John, fl. 1559-1577.
publisher: By Iohn Awdeley, dwelling by great S. Bartelmewes beyonde Aldersgate,
notes: Signed: Q[uod] I.A., i.e. John Awdelay.
Verse - "By Edward the sixt, of England kyng,".
